details: Update `STANDARDS.md` with specific 'Modern v2' design tokens (Glassmorphism, large border-radius, Tailwind colors). Create `tests/test_design_system.py` which crawls app pages and asserts that key elements (buttons, cards, inputs) adhere to the new class conventions (e.g., `rounded-xl`, no inline styles).

Create standard Django partials in `templates/components/` for: `button.html`, `card.html`, `input.html`, `modal.html`. Implement these using the Modern v2 tokens. Create a 'Kitchen Sink' view in Hub to visually verify these components.
Update `templates/layouts/golden_base.html`. Implement a sticky 'Glass' navbar and a modernized footer. Add global transition effects. Verify with `test_design_system.py`.
Refactor Hub templates to use `templates/components/*`. Replace manual HTML cards with the `card.html` partial. Ensure the App Grid is responsive and animated.
Refactor KrisPC templates. Update the Hero section to use modern typography and spacing. Replace form widgets with `input.html` partials.
Refactor Plexus templates. Focus on Dark Mode polish. Ensure the 'Dashboard' and 'Capture' views use the glassmorphic card style.
Refactor Pdf2Cal templates. Clean up the dense 'Event Settings' forms using the new component library to improve readability and touch targets.
Migrate `apps/emoty_web` templates to extend `layouts/golden_base.html`. Apply the design system to its main views. Add Emoty to `tests/test_ui_standardization.py` and `tests/test_design_system.py`.
